lead_paragraph: China's tougher lean-fuel policies, as well as an economy growing at its slowest pace in 25 years, are driving lower coal use at a faster rate than expected.

headline.main: Beijing's Effort to Reduce Coal Burning Shows Results
headline.print_headline: Beijing's Effort to Reduce Coal Burning Shows Results

snippet: China's tougher lean-fuel policies, as well as an economy growing at its slowest pace in 25 years, are driving lower coal use at a faster rate than expected.
